attributes.action: create a formal compasionate/family leave allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the death of a relative it is natural to require time off for grieving, yet many employers force staff to take annual leave or to work a flexi-hours scheme in order to make up their lost time.

It is inevitable that we will also lose a loved one at some time in our life. Surely we can find it within us to show some compassion to those around us who have lost a close family member and give them the peace of mind that they are actually entitled to time off to grieve and make arrangements without having to use their annual leave or even to make up their lost hours.

The South African government provides 'Family Responsibility' Leave of 5 days in a 3 year period.

Surely, it is not unreasonable as human beings to follow the South African model and show love and compassion for our fellow people.
